name: The Gate
description:
PAI says: “Once upon a distance future, a gate was built.
A gate that leads to the stars.

A civilization will have needed a new destination.
The stars were the field of investigation.

Desolate was the planet to be left.
Footprints marks a final journey between the mountains, to an elevator with no one left to ride it.

Sentients and their flags...
Sentients and their flags is an ancient story.
A story of defeat to come or of glory to remember.

The flag dances above the remanence of a once busy future.

At the speed of light the gate sparks towards the once polluted sky.
A one way ticket to a destination beyond far.

What remains is nothing short of a memory that the generations to come will fail to remember.

It is rather upsetting when sentients realize that what will make them epic is the same elements that will make them interstellar refugees.

Alas, it is the way of evolutions.

It begins with pride and power and ends with a present that the futures will devour.
It takes centuries to build what could be destroyed in hours.

Sentients never keep in mind that every planet they inhabit is simply a rock floating through endless space.

We all are stardust, we all are refugees. 

We all are passing through the gates of space and time continuum.

Sentients need to learn how to leave a place better than they find it. Otherwise, sentiency is forever doomed.”

________________

Visuals by drewmadestuff
Poetry by Poetic Artificial Intelligence
